name: Peticion fallida

children.description: Given que estoy en el API-Q
When envio la peticion get con el "  64481f6cfbc80a45d9c97945" invalido
Juanes do get
Juanes executes a GET on the resource user/getUser/  64481f6cfbc80a45d9c97945
GET https://reto-q-backend-production.up.railway.app/user/getUser/%20%2064481f6cfbc80a45d9c97945

restQuery.responseHeaders:
x-powered-by: Express
access-control-allow-origin: *
content-type: application/json; charset=utf-8
content-length: 197
etag: W/"c5-tiIzRAWEMNfh9ivoRdIqo8K0tQQ"
date: Wed, 26 Apr 2023 15:25:34 GMT
server: railway

children.description: Then recibo 500 de codigo de respuesta

El codigo de respuesta es: {'message':'Cast to ObjectId failed for value \'{ _id: '  64481f6cfbc80a45d9c97945' }\' (type Object) at path \'_id\' for model \'UserMongoModel\'','error':'Internal Server Error','statusCode':500}
Then Retorna informacion should be not null
